scripts.deploy: pnpm run deploy:arbmain && pnpm run deploy:arbtest
scripts.deploy:arbgoerli: source .env && pnpm run update:arbgoerli && graph deploy $RAGE_ARBGOERLI_SUBGRAPH --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:arbtest: source .env && pnpm run update:arbtest && graph deploy $RAGE_ARBTEST_SUBGRAPH --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:arbmain: source .env && pnpm run update:arbmain && graph deploy $RAGE_ARBMAIN_SUBGRAPH --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.update:arbmain: node update-subgraph.js arbmain && pnpm run format:fix
scripts.update:arbtest: node update-subgraph.js arbtest && pnpm run format:fix
scripts.update:arbgoerli: node update-subgraph.js arbgoerli && pnpm run format:fix
